result.reason: Help page opens in external browser but should load as an internal HTTP connection in a dedicated panel tab
result.approach: Modify mMenInfoHelp_Click to create an HTTP ConnectionInfo for the documentation URL and open it in a dedicated panel tab instead of launching Process.Start with the external browser

attempts.raw_output:
Based on the code analysis, the Help menu currently opens the documentation URL in an external browser via `Process.Start`. Issue #1432 requests it load inside mRemoteNG as its own panel tab (using the built-in HTTP protocol).

```json
{"decision":"implement","reason":"Help page opens in external browser but should load as an internal HTTP connection in a dedicated panel tab","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/UI/Menu/msMain/HelpMenu.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/WebHelper.cs"],"approach":"Modify mMenInfoHelp_Click to create an HTTP ConnectionInfo for the documentation URL and open it in a dedicated panel tab instead of launching Process.Start with the external browser"}
```
